  • HDFStore

    • append_to_multiple automatically synchronizes writing rows to multiple tables and adds a dropna kwarg (:issue:`4698`)

      System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 661); backlink

      Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

    • handle a passed Series in table format (:issue:`4330`)

      System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 663); backlink

      Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

    • added an is_open property to indicate if the underlying file handle is_open; a closed store will now report 'CLOSED' when viewing the store (rather than raising an error) (:issue:`4409`)

      System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 664); backlink

      Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

    • a close of a HDFStore now will close that instance of the HDFStore but will only close the actual file if the ref count (by PyTables) w.r.t. all of the open handles are 0. Essentially you have a local instance of HDFStore referenced by a variable. Once you close it, it will report closed. Other references (to the same file) will continue to operate until they themselves are closed. Performing an action on a closed file will raise ClosedFileError

    • removed the _quiet attribute, replace by a DuplicateWarning if retrieving duplicate rows from a table (:issue:`4367`)

      System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 674); backlink

      Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

    • removed the warn argument from open. Instead a PossibleDataLossError exception will be raised if you try to use mode='w' with an OPEN file handle (:issue:`4367`)

      System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 676); backlink

      Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

    • allow a passed locations array or mask as a where condition (:issue:`4467`)

      System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 679); backlink

      Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

    • add the keyword dropna=True to append to change whether ALL nan rows are not written to the store (default is True, ALL nan rows are NOT written), also settable via the option io.hdf.dropna_table (:issue:`4625`)

      System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 681); backlink

      Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

    • the format keyword now replaces the table keyword; allowed values are fixed(f)|table(t) the Storer format has been renamed to Fixed

    • a column multi-index will be recreated properly (:issue:`4710`); raise on trying to use a multi-index with data_columns on the same axis

      System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 705); backlink

      Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

  • Index and MultiIndex changes (:issue:`4039`):

    System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 709); backlink

    Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

    • Setting levels and labels directly on MultiIndex is now deprecated. Instead, you can use the set_levels() and set_labels() methods.

    • levels, labels and names properties no longer return lists, but instead return containers that do not allow setting of items ('mostly immutable')

    • levels, labels and names are validated upon setting and are either copied or shallow-copied.

    • inplace setting of levels or labels now correctly invalidates the cached properties. (:issue:`5238`).

      System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 719); backlink

      Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

    • __deepcopy__ now returns a shallow copy (currently: a view) of the data - allowing metadata changes.

    • MultiIndex.astype() now only allows np.object_-like dtypes and now returns a MultiIndex rather than an Index. (:issue:`4039`)

      System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 723); backlink

      Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

    • Added is_ method to Index that allows fast equality comparison of views (similar to np.may_share_memory but no false positives, and changes on levels and labels setting on MultiIndex). (:issue:`4859` , :issue:`4909`)

    Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

  • raise a TypeError on invalid comparison ops on Series/DataFrame (e.g. integer/datetime) (:issue:`4968`)

    System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 759); backlink

    Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

  • Added a new index type, Float64Index. This will be automatically created when passing floating values in index creation. This enables a pure label-based slicing paradigm that makes [],ix,loc for scalar indexing and slicing work exactly the same. Indexing on other index types are preserved (and positional fallback for [],ix), with the exception, that floating point slicing on indexes on non Float64Index will raise a TypeError, e.g. Series(range(5))[3.5:4.5] (:issue:`263`,:issue:5375)

  • All division with NDFrame - likes is now truedivision, regardless of the future import. You can use // and floordiv to do integer division.

System Message: WARNING/2 (<string>, line 798)

Cannot analyze code. Pygments package not found.

      .. code-block:: python

         In [3]: arr = np.array([1, 2, 3, 4])

         In [4]: arr2 = np.array([5, 3, 2, 1])

         In [5]: arr / arr2
         Out[5]: array([0, 0, 1, 4])

         In [6]: pd.Series(arr) / pd.Series(arr2) # no future import required
         Out[6]:
         0    0.200000
         1    0.666667
         2    1.500000
         3    4.000000
         dtype: float64

  • raise/warn SettingWithCopyError/Warning exception/warning when setting of a copy thru chained assignment is detected, settable via option mode.chained_assignment

  • test the list of NA values in the csv parser. add N/A, #NA as independent default na values (:issue:`5521`)

    System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 817); backlink

    Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

  • The refactoring involving``Series`` deriving from NDFrame breaks rpy2<=2.3.8. an Issue has been opened against rpy2 and a workaround is detailed in :issue:`5698`. Thanks @JanSchulz.

    System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 819); backlink

    Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

  • Series.argmin and Series.argmax are now aliased to Series.idxmin and Series.idxmax. These return the index of the min or max element respectively. Prior to 0.13.0 these would return the position of the min / max element (:issue:`6214`)

    System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 821); backlink

    Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

Internal Refactoring

In 0.13.0 there is a major refactor primarily to subclass Series from NDFrame, which is the base class currently for DataFrame and Panel, to unify methods and behaviors. Series formerly subclassed directly from ndarray. (:issue:`4080`, :issue:`3862`, :issue:`816`) See :ref:`Internal Refactoring<whatsnew_0130.refactoring>`

System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 828); backlink

Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 828); backlink

Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 828); backlink

Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 828); backlink

Unknown interpreted text role "ref".
  • Refactor of series.py/frame.py/panel.py to move common code to generic.py
  • added _setup_axes to created generic NDFrame structures
  • moved methods
    • from_axes, _wrap_array, axes, ix, loc, iloc, shape, empty, swapaxes, transpose, pop
    • __iter__, keys, __contains__, __len__, __neg__, __invert__
    • convert_objects, as_blocks, as_matrix, values
    • __getstate__, __setstate__ (compat remains in frame/panel)
    • __getattr__, __setattr__
    • _indexed_same, reindex_like, align, where, mask
    • fillna, replace (Series replace is now consistent with DataFrame)
    • filter (also added axis argument to selectively filter on a different axis)
    • reindex, reindex_axis, take
    • truncate (moved to become part of NDFrame)
    • isnull/notnull now available on NDFrame objects
  • These are API changes which make Panel more consistent with DataFrame
  • swapaxes on a Panel with the same axes specified now return a copy
  • support attribute access for setting
  • filter supports same api as original DataFrame filter
  • fillna refactored to core/generic.py, while > 3ndim is NotImplemented
  • Series now inherits from NDFrame rather than directly from ndarray. There are several minor changes that affect the API.
  • numpy functions that do not support the array interface will now return ndarrays rather than series, e.g. np.diff, np.ones_like, np.where
  • Series(0.5) would previously return the scalar 0.5, this is no longer supported
  • TimeSeries is now an alias for Series. the property is_time_series can be used to distinguish (if desired)
  • Refactor of Sparse objects to use BlockManager
  • Created a new block type in internals, SparseBlock, which can hold multi-dtypes and is non-consolidatable. SparseSeries and SparseDataFrame now inherit more methods from there hierarchy (Series/DataFrame), and no longer inherit from SparseArray (which instead is the object of the SparseBlock)
  • Sparse suite now supports integration with non-sparse data. Non-float sparse data is supportable (partially implemented)
  • Operations on sparse structures within DataFrames should preserve sparseness, merging type operations will convert to dense (and back to sparse), so might be somewhat inefficient
  • enable setitem on SparseSeries for boolean/integer/slices
  • SparsePanels implementation is unchanged (e.g. not using BlockManager, needs work)

  • added ftypes method to Series/DataFame, similar to dtypes, but indicates if the underlying is sparse/dense (as well as the dtype)

  • All NDFrame objects now have a _prop_attributes, which can be used to indcated various values to propogate to a new object from an existing (e.g. name in Series will follow more automatically now)

  • Internal type checking is now done via a suite of generated classes, allowing isinstance(value, klass) without having to directly import the klass, courtesy of @jtratner

  • Bug in Series update where the parent frame is not updating its cache based on changes (:issue:`4080`, :issue:`5216`) or types (:issue:`3217`), fillna (:issue:`3386`)

    System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 898); backlink

    Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

    System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 898); backlink

    Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

    System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 898); backlink

    Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

    System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 898); backlink

    Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

  • Indexing with dtype conversions fixed (:issue:`4463`, :issue:`4204`)

    System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 901); backlink

    Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

    System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 901); backlink

    Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

    System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 902); backlink

  • Base DateOffsets are no longer all instantiated on importing pandas, instead they are generated and cached on the fly. The internal representation and handling of DateOffsets has also been clarified. (:issue:`5189`, related :issue:`5004`)

pandas 0.12.0

Release date: 2013-07-24

New Features

  • pd.read_html() can now parse HTML strings, files or urls and returns a list of DataFrame s courtesy of @cpcloud. (:issue:`3477`, :issue:`3605`, :issue:`3606`)

    System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 1248); backlink

    Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

    System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 1248); backlink

    Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

    System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 1248); backlink

    Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

  • Support for reading Amazon S3 files. (:issue:`3504`)

    System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 1251); backlink

    Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

  • Added module for reading and writing JSON strings/files: pandas.io.json includes to_json DataFrame/Series method, and a read_json top-level reader various issues (:issue:`1226`, :issue:`3804`, :issue:`3876`, :issue:`3867`, :issue:`1305`)

    System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 1252); backlink

    Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

    System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 1252); backlink

    Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

    System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 1252); backlink

    Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

    System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 1252); backlink

    Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

    System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 1252); backlink

    Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

  • Added module for reading and writing Stata files: pandas.io.stata (:issue:`1512`) includes to_stata DataFrame method, and a read_stata top-level reader

    System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 1255); backlink

    Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

  • Added support for writing in to_csv and reading in read_csv, multi-index columns. The header option in read_csv now accepts a list of the rows from which to read the index. Added the option, tupleize_cols to provide compatiblity for the pre 0.12 behavior of writing and reading multi-index columns via a list of tuples. The default in 0.12 is to write lists of tuples and not interpret list of tuples as a multi-index column. Note: The default value will change in 0.12 to make the default to write and read multi-index columns in the new format. (:issue:`3571`, :issue:`1651`, :issue:`3141`)

    System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 1257); backlink

    Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

    System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 1257); backlink

    Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

    System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 1257); backlink

    Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

  • Add iterator to Series.str (:issue:`3638`)

    System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 1266); backlink

    Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

  • pd.set_option() now allows N option, value pairs (:issue:`3667`).

    System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 1267); backlink

    Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

  • Added keyword parameters for different types of scatter_matrix subplots

  • A filter method on grouped Series or DataFrames returns a subset of the original (:issue:`3680`, :issue:`919`)

    System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 1269); backlink

    Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

    System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 1269); backlink

    Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

  • Access to historical Google Finance data in pandas.io.data (:issue:`3814`)

    System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 1271); backlink

    Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

  • DataFrame plotting methods can sample column colors from a Matplotlib colormap via the colormap keyword. (:issue:`3860`)

    System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 1272); backlink

    Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

Improvements to existing features

  • Fixed various issues with internal pprinting code, the repr() for various objects including TimeStamp and Index now produces valid python code strings and can be used to recreate the object, (:issue:`3038`, :issue:`3379`, :issue:`3251`, :issue:`3460`)

    System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 1278); backlink

    Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

    System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 1278); backlink

    Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

    System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 1278); backlink

    Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

    System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 1278); backlink

    Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

  • convert_objects now accepts a copy parameter (defaults to True)

  • HDFStore

    • will retain index attributes (freq,tz,name) on recreation (:issue:`3499`,:issue:4098)

      System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 1284); backlink

      Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

    • will warn with a AttributeConflictWarning if you are attempting to append an index with a different frequency than the existing, or attempting to append an index with a different name than the existing

    • support datelike columns with a timezone as data_columns (:issue:`2852`)

      System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 1288); backlink

      Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

    • table writing performance improvements.

    • support python3 (via PyTables 3.0.0) (:issue:`3750`)

      System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 1290); backlink

      Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

  • Add modulo operator to Series, DataFrame

  • Add date method to DatetimeIndex

  • Add dropna argument to pivot_table (:issue: 3820)

  • Simplified the API and added a describe method to Categorical

  • melt now accepts the optional parameters var_name and value_name to specify custom column names of the returned DataFrame (:issue:`3649`), thanks @hoechenberger. If var_name is not specified and dataframe.columns.name is not None, then this will be used as the var_name (:issue:`4144`). Also support for MultiIndex columns.

    System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 1295); backlink

    Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

    System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 1295); backlink

    Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

  • clipboard functions use pyperclip (no dependencies on Windows, alternative dependencies offered for Linux) (:issue:`3837`).

    System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 1300); backlink

    Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

  • Plotting functions now raise a TypeError before trying to plot anything if the associated objects have have a dtype of object (:issue:`1818`, :issue:`3572`, :issue:`3911`, :issue:`3912`), but they will try to convert object arrays to numeric arrays if possible so that you can still plot, for example, an object array with floats. This happens before any drawing takes place which elimnates any spurious plots from showing up.

    System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 1302); backlink

    Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

    System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 1302); backlink

    Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

    System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 1302); backlink

    Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

    System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 1302); backlink

    Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

  • Added Faq section on repr display options, to help users customize their setup.

  • where operations that result in block splitting are much faster (:issue:`3733`)

    System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 1309); backlink

    Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

  • Series and DataFrame hist methods now take a figsize argument (:issue:`3834`)

    System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 1310); backlink

    Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

  • DatetimeIndexes no longer try to convert mixed-integer indexes during join operations (:issue:`3877`)

    System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 1311); backlink

    Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

  • Add unit keyword to Timestamp and to_datetime to enable passing of integers or floats that are in an epoch unit of D, s, ms, us, ns, thanks @mtkini (:issue:`3969`) (e.g. unix timestamps or epoch s, with fracional seconds allowed) (:issue:`3540`)

    System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 1313); backlink

    Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

    System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 1313); backlink

    Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

  • DataFrame corr method (spearman) is now cythonized.

  • Improved network test decorator to catch IOError (and therefore URLError as well). Added with_connectivity_check decorator to allow explicitly checking a website as a proxy for seeing if there is network connectivity. Plus, new optional_args decorator factory for decorators. (:issue:`3910`, :issue:`3914`)

    System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 1317); backlink

    Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

    System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 1317); backlink

    Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

  • read_csv will now throw a more informative error message when a file contains no columns, e.g., all newline characters

  • Added layout keyword to DataFrame.hist() for more customizable layout (:issue:`4050`)

    System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 1324); backlink

    Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

  • Timestamp.min and Timestamp.max now represent valid Timestamp instances instead of the default datetime.min and datetime.max (respectively), thanks @SleepingPills

  • read_html now raises when no tables are found and BeautifulSoup==4.2.0 is detected (:issue:`4214`)

    System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 1327); backlink

    Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

API Changes

  • HDFStore

    • When removing an object, remove(key) raises KeyError if the key is not a valid store object.

    • raise a TypeError on passing where or columns to select with a Storer; these are invalid parameters at this time (:issue:`4189`)

      System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 1337); backlink

      Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

    • can now specify an encoding option to append/put to enable alternate encodings (:issue:`3750`)

      System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 1339); backlink

      Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

    • enable support for iterator/chunksize with read_hdf

  • The repr() for (Multi)Index now obeys display.max_seq_items rather then numpy threshold print options. (:issue:`3426`, :issue:`3466`)

    System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 1342); backlink

    Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

    System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 1342); backlink

    Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

  • Added mangle_dupe_cols option to read_table/csv, allowing users to control legacy behaviour re dupe cols (A, A.1, A.2 vs A, A ) (:issue:`3468`) Note: The default value will change in 0.12 to the "no mangle" behaviour, If your code relies on this behaviour, explicitly specify mangle_dupe_cols=True in your calls.

    System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 1344); backlink

    Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

  • Do not allow astypes on datetime64[ns] except to object, and timedelta64[ns] to object/int (:issue:`3425`)

    System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 1349); backlink

    Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

  • The behavior of datetime64 dtypes has changed with respect to certain so-called reduction operations (:issue:`3726`). The following operations now raise a TypeError when perfomed on a Series and return an empty Series when performed on a DataFrame similar to performing these operations on, for example, a DataFrame of slice objects: - sum, prod, mean, std, var, skew, kurt, corr, and cov

    System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 1351); backlink

    Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

  • Do not allow datetimelike/timedeltalike creation except with valid types (e.g. cannot pass datetime64[ms]) (:issue:`3423`)

    System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 1357); backlink

    Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

  • Add squeeze keyword to groupby to allow reduction from DataFrame -> Series if groups are unique. Regression from 0.10.1, partial revert on (:issue:`2893`) with (:issue:`3596`)

    System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 1359); backlink

    Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

    System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 1359); backlink

    Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

  • Raise on iloc when boolean indexing with a label based indexer mask e.g. a boolean Series, even with integer labels, will raise. Since iloc is purely positional based, the labels on the Series are not alignable (:issue:`3631`)

    System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 1362); backlink

    Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

  • The raise_on_error option to plotting methods is obviated by :issue:`3572`, so it is removed. Plots now always raise when data cannot be plotted or the object being plotted has a dtype of object.

    System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 1365); backlink

    Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

  • DataFrame.interpolate() is now deprecated. Please use DataFrame.fillna() and DataFrame.replace() instead (:issue:`3582`, :issue:`3675`, :issue:`3676`).

    System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 1368); backlink

    Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

    System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 1368); backlink

    Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

    System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 1368); backlink

    Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

  • the method and axis arguments of DataFrame.replace() are deprecated

  • DataFrame.replace 's infer_types parameter is removed and now performs conversion by default. (:issue:`3907`)

    System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 1373); backlink

    Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

  • Deprecated display.height, display.width is now only a formatting option does not control triggering of summary, similar to < 0.11.0.

  • Add the keyword allow_duplicates to DataFrame.insert to allow a duplicate column to be inserted if True, default is False (same as prior to 0.12) (:issue:`3679`)

    System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 1377); backlink

    Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

  • io API changes

    • added pandas.io.api for i/o imports
    • removed Excel support to pandas.io.excel
    • added top-level pd.read_sql and to_sql DataFrame methods
    • removed clipboard support to pandas.io.clipboard
    • replace top-level and instance methods save and load with top-level read_pickle and to_pickle instance method, save and load will give deprecation warning.

  • the method and axis arguments of DataFrame.replace() are deprecated

  • set FutureWarning to require data_source, and to replace year/month with expiry date in pandas.io options. This is in preparation to add options data from google (:issue:`3822`)

    System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 1390); backlink

    Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

  • the method and axis arguments of DataFrame.replace() are deprecated

  • Implement __nonzero__ for NDFrame objects (:issue:`3691`, :issue:`3696`)

    System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 1395); backlink

    Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

    System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 1395); backlink

    Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

  • as_matrix with mixed signed and unsigned dtypes will result in 2 x the lcd of the unsigned as an int, maxing with int64, to avoid precision issues (:issue:`3733`)

    System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 1396); backlink

    Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

  • na_values in a list provided to read_csv/read_excel will match string and numeric versions e.g. na_values=['99'] will match 99 whether the column ends up being int, float, or string (:issue:`3611`)

    System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 1398); backlink

    Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

  • read_html now defaults to None when reading, and falls back on bs4 + html5lib when lxml fails to parse. a list of parsers to try until success is also valid

  • more consistency in the to_datetime return types (give string/array of string inputs) (:issue:`3888`)

    System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 1403); backlink

    Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

  • The internal pandas class hierarchy has changed (slightly). The previous PandasObject now is called PandasContainer and a new PandasObject has become the baseclass for PandasContainer as well as Index, Categorical, GroupBy, SparseList, and SparseArray (+ their base classes). Currently, PandasObject provides string methods (from StringMixin). (:issue:`4090`, :issue:`4092`)

    System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 1404); backlink

    Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

    System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 1404); backlink

    Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

  • New StringMixin that, given a __unicode__ method, gets python 2 and python 3 compatible string methods (__str__, __bytes__, and __repr__). Plus string safety throughout. Now employed in many places throughout the pandas library. (:issue:`4090`, :issue:`4092`)

    System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 1410); backlink

    Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

    System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 1410); backlink

    Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

Experimental Features

  • Added experimental CustomBusinessDay class to support DateOffsets with custom holiday calendars and custom weekmasks. (:issue:`2301`)

    System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 1418); backlink

    Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

pandas 0.11.0

Release date: 2013-04-22

New Features

  • New documentation section, 10 Minutes to Pandas

  • New documentation section, Cookbook

  • Allow mixed dtypes (e.g float32/float64/int32/int16/int8) to coexist in DataFrames and propogate in operations

  • Add function to pandas.io.data for retrieving stock index components from Yahoo! finance (:issue:`2795`)

    System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 1581); backlink

    Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

  • Support slicing with time objects (:issue:`2681`)

    System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 1582); backlink

    Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

  • Added .iloc attribute, to support strict integer based indexing, analogous to .ix (:issue:`2922`)

    System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 1583); backlink

    Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

  • Added .loc attribute, to support strict label based indexing, analagous to .ix (:issue:`3053`)

    System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 1584); backlink

    Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

  • Added .iat attribute, to support fast scalar access via integers (replaces iget_value/iset_value)

  • Added .at attribute, to support fast scalar access via labels (replaces get_value/set_value)

  • Moved functionaility from irow,icol,iget_value/iset_value to .iloc indexer (via _ixs methods in each object)

  • Added support for expression evaluation using the numexpr library

  • Added convert=boolean to take routines to translate negative indices to positive, defaults to True

  • Added to_series() method to indices, to facilitate the creation of indexeres (:issue:`3275`)

    System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 1590); backlink

    Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

Improvements to existing features

  • Improved performance of df.to_csv() by up to 10x in some cases. (:issue:`3059`)

    System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 1595); backlink

    Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

  • added blocks attribute to DataFrames, to return a dict of dtypes to homogeneously dtyped DataFrames

  • added keyword convert_numeric to convert_objects() to try to convert object dtypes to numeric types (default is False)

  • convert_dates in convert_objects can now be coerce which will return a datetime64[ns] dtype with non-convertibles set as NaT; will preserve an all-nan object (e.g. strings), default is True (to perform soft-conversion

  • Series print output now includes the dtype by default

  • Optimize internal reindexing routines (:issue:`2819`, :issue:`2867`)

    System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 1602); backlink

    Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

    System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 1602); backlink

    Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

  • describe_option() now reports the default and current value of options.

  • Add format option to pandas.to_datetime with faster conversion of strings that can be parsed with datetime.strptime

  • Add axes property to Series for compatibility

  • Add xs function to Series for compatibility

  • Allow setitem in a frame where only mixed numerics are present (e.g. int and float), (:issue:`3037`)

    System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 1607); backlink

    Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

  • HDFStore

    • Provide dotted attribute access to get from stores (e.g. store.df == store['df'])

    • New keywords iterator=boolean, and chunksize=number_in_a_chunk are provided to support iteration on select and select_as_multiple (:issue:`3076`)

      System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 1611); backlink

      Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

    • support read_hdf/to_hdf API similar to read_csv/to_csv (:issue:`3222`)

      System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 1612); backlink

      Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

  • Add squeeze method to possibly remove length 1 dimensions from an object.

    System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 1616)

    Unknown directive type "ipython".

          .. ipython:: python

         p = Panel(randn(3,4,4),items=['ItemA','ItemB','ItemC'],
                            major_axis=date_range('20010102',periods=4),
                            minor_axis=['A','B','C','D'])
         p
         p.reindex(items=['ItemA']).squeeze()
         p.reindex(items=['ItemA'],minor=['B']).squeeze()

  • Improvement to Yahoo API access in pd.io.data.Options (:issue:`2758`)

    System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 1625); backlink

    Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

  • added option display.max_seq_items to control the number of elements printed per sequence pprinting it. (:issue:`2979`)

    System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 1626); backlink

    Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

  • added option display.chop_threshold to control display of small numerical values. (:issue:`2739`)

    System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 1627); backlink

    Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

  • added option display.max_info_rows to prevent verbose_info from being calculated for frames above 1M rows (configurable). (:issue:`2807`, :issue:`2918`)

    System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 1628); backlink

    Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

    System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 1628); backlink

    Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

  • value_counts() now accepts a "normalize" argument, for normalized histograms. (:issue:`2710`).

    System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 1630); backlink

    Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

  • DataFrame.from_records now accepts not only dicts but any instance of the collections.Mapping ABC.

  • Allow selection semantics via a string with a datelike index to work in both Series and DataFrames (:issue:`3070`)

    System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 1632); backlink

    Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

    System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 1634)

    Unknown directive type "ipython".

          .. ipython:: python

          idx = date_range("2001-10-1", periods=5, freq='M')
          ts = Series(np.random.rand(len(idx)),index=idx)
          ts['2001']

          df = DataFrame(dict(A = ts))
          df['2001']

  • added option display.mpl_style providing a sleeker visual style for plots. Based on https://gist.github.com/huyng/816622 (:issue:`3075`).

    System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 1643); backlink

    Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

  • Improved performance across several core functions by taking memory ordering of arrays into account. Courtesy of @stephenwlin (:issue:`3130`)

    System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 1644); backlink

    Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

  • Improved performance of groupby transform method (:issue:`2121`)

    System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 1646); backlink

    Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

  • Handle "ragged" CSV files missing trailing delimiters in rows with missing fields when also providing explicit list of column names (so the parser knows how many columns to expect in the result) (:issue:`2981`)

    System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 1647); backlink

    Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

  • On a mixed DataFrame, allow setting with indexers with ndarray/DataFrame on rhs (:issue:`3216`)

    System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 1649); backlink

    Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

  • Treat boolean values as integers (values 1 and 0) for numeric operations. (:issue:`2641`)

    System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 1650); backlink

    Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

  • Add time method to DatetimeIndex (:issue:`3180`)

    System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 1651); backlink

    Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

  • Return NA when using Series.str[...] for values that are not long enough (:issue:`3223`)

    System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 1652); backlink

    Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

  • Display cursor coordinate information in time-series plots (:issue:`1670`)

    System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 1653); backlink

    Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

  • to_html() now accepts an optional "escape" argument to control reserved HTML character escaping (enabled by default) and escapes &, in addition to < and >. (:issue:`2919`)

    System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 1654); backlink

    Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

API Changes

  • Do not automatically upcast numeric specified dtypes to int64 or float64 (:issue:`622` and :issue:`797`)

    System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 1660); backlink

    Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

    System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 1660); backlink

    Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

  • DataFrame construction of lists and scalars, with no dtype present, will result in casting to int64 or float64, regardless of platform. This is not an apparent change in the API, but noting it.

  • Guarantee that convert_objects() for Series/DataFrame always returns a copy

  • groupby operations will respect dtypes for numeric float operations (float32/float64); other types will be operated on, and will try to cast back to the input dtype (e.g. if an int is passed, as long as the output doesn't have nans, then an int will be returned)

  • backfill/pad/take/diff/ohlc will now support float32/int16/int8 operations

  • Block types will upcast as needed in where/masking operations (:issue:`2793`)

    System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 1673); backlink

    Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

  • Series now automatically will try to set the correct dtype based on passed datetimelike objects (datetime/Timestamp)

    • timedelta64 are returned in appropriate cases (e.g. Series - Series, when both are datetime64)

    • mixed datetimes and objects (:issue:`2751`) in a constructor will be cast correctly

      System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 1679); backlink

      Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

    • astype on datetimes to object are now handled (as well as NaT conversions to np.nan)

    • all timedelta like objects will be correctly assigned to timedelta64 with mixed NaN and/or NaT allowed

  • arguments to DataFrame.clip were inconsistent to numpy and Series clipping (:issue:`2747`)

    System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 1686); backlink

    Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

  • util.testing.assert_frame_equal now checks the column and index names (:issue:`2964`)

    System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 1688); backlink

    Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

  • Constructors will now return a more informative ValueError on failures when invalid shapes are passed

  • Don't suppress TypeError in GroupBy.agg (:issue:`3238`)

    System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 1691); backlink

    Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

  • Methods return None when inplace=True (:issue:`1893`)

    System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 1692); backlink

    Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

  • HDFStore

    • added the method select_column to select a single column from a table as a Series.
    • deprecated the unique method, can be replicated by select_column(key,column).unique()
    • min_itemsize parameter will now automatically create data_columns for passed keys

  • Downcast on pivot if possible (:issue:`3283`), adds argument downcast to fillna

    System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 1699); backlink

    Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

  • Introduced options display.height/width for explicitly specifying terminal height/width in characters. Deprecated display.line_width, now replaced by display.width. These defaults are in effect for scripts as well, so unless disabled, previously very wide output will now be output as "expand_repr" style wrapped output.

  • Various defaults for options (including display.max_rows) have been revised, after a brief survey concluded they were wrong for everyone. Now at w=80,h=60.

  • HTML repr output in IPython qtconsole is once again controlled by the option display.notebook_repr_html, and on by default.

Bug Fixes

  • Fix seg fault on empty data frame when fillna with pad or backfill (:issue:`2778`)

    System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 1712); backlink

    Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

  • Single element ndarrays of datetimelike objects are handled (e.g. np.array(datetime(2001,1,1,0,0))), w/o dtype being passed

  • 0-dim ndarrays with a passed dtype are handled correctly (e.g. np.array(0.,dtype='float32'))

  • Fix some boolean indexing inconsistencies in Series.__getitem__/__setitem__ (:issue:`2776`)

    System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 1718); backlink

    Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

  • Fix issues with DataFrame and Series constructor with integers that overflow int64 and some mixed typed type lists (:issue:`2845`)

    System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 1720); backlink

    Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

  • HDFStore

    • Fix weird PyTables error when using too many selectors in a where also correctly filter on any number of values in a Term expression (so not using numexpr filtering, but isin filtering)

    • Internally, change all variables to be private-like (now have leading underscore)

    • Fixes for query parsing to correctly interpret boolean and != (:issue:`2849`, :issue:`2973`)

      System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 1730); backlink

      Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

      System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 1730); backlink

      Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

      System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 1731); backlink

      Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

    • Fixes bug with writing rows if part of a block was all-nan (:issue:`3012`)

      System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 1733); backlink

      Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

    • Exceptions are now ValueError or TypeError as needed

    • A table will now raise if min_itemsize contains fields which are not queryables

  • Bug showing up in applymap where some object type columns are converted (:issue:`2909`) had an incorrect default in convert_objects

    System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 1737); backlink

    Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

  • TimeDeltas

    • Series ops with a Timestamp on the rhs was throwing an exception (:issue:`2898`) added tests for Series ops with datetimes,timedeltas,Timestamps, and datelike Series on both lhs and rhs

      System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 1742); backlink

      Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

    • Fixed subtle timedelta64 inference issue on py3 & numpy 1.7.0 (:issue:`3094`)

      System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 1745); backlink

      Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

    • Fixed some formatting issues on timedelta when negative

    • Support null checking on timedelta64, representing (and formatting) with NaT

    • Support setitem with np.nan value, converts to NaT

    • Support min/max ops in a Dataframe (abs not working, nor do we error on non-supported ops)

    • Support idxmin/idxmax/abs/max/min in a Series (:issue:`2989`, :issue:`2982`)

pandas 0.10.1

Release date: 2013-01-22

New Features

  • Add data inferface to World Bank WDI pandas.io.wb (:issue:`2592`)

    System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 1840); backlink

    Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

API Changes

  • Restored inplace=True behavior returning self (same object) with deprecation warning until 0.11 (:issue:`1893`)

    System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 1845); backlink

    Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

  • HDFStore

    • refactored HFDStore to deal with non-table stores as objects, will allow future enhancements
    • removed keyword compression from put (replaced by keyword complib to be consistent across library)
    • warn PerformanceWarning if you are attempting to store types that will be pickled by PyTables

Improvements to existing features

  • HDFStore

    • enables storing of multi-index dataframes (closes :issue:`1277`)

      System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 1859); backlink

      Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

    • support data column indexing and selection, via data_columns keyword in append

    • support write chunking to reduce memory footprint, via chunksize keyword to append

    • support automagic indexing via index keyword to append

    • support expectedrows keyword in append to inform PyTables about the expected tablesize

    • support start and stop keywords in select to limit the row selection space

    • added get_store context manager to automatically import with pandas

    • added column filtering via columns keyword in select

    • added methods append_to_multiple/select_as_multiple/select_as_coordinates to do multiple-table append/selection

    • added support for datetime64 in columns

    • added method unique to select the unique values in an indexable or data column

    • added method copy to copy an existing store (and possibly upgrade)

    • show the shape of the data on disk for non-table stores when printing the store

    • added ability to read PyTables flavor tables (allows compatiblity to other HDF5 systems)

  • Add logx option to DataFrame/Series.plot (:issue:`2327`, :issue:`2565`)

    System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 1882); backlink

    Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

    System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 1882); backlink

    Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

  • Support reading gzipped data from file-like object

  • pivot_table aggfunc can be anything used in GroupBy.aggregate (:issue:`2643`)

    System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 1884); backlink

    Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

  • Implement DataFrame merges in case where set cardinalities might overflow 64-bit integer (:issue:`2690`)

    System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 1885); backlink

    Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

  • Raise exception in C file parser if integer dtype specified and have NA values. (:issue:`2631`)

    System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 1887); backlink

    Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

  • Attempt to parse ISO8601 format dates when parse_dates=True in read_csv for major performance boost in such cases (:issue:`2698`)

    System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 1889); backlink

    Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

  • Add methods neg and inv to Series

  • Implement kind option in ExcelFile to indicate whether it's an XLS or XLSX file (:issue:`2613`)

    System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 1892); backlink

    Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

  • Documented a fast-path in pd.read_Csv when parsing iso8601 datetime strings yielding as much as a 20x speedup. (:issue:`5993`)

    System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 1894); backlink

    Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

Bug Fixes

  • Fix read_csv/read_table multithreading issues (:issue:`2608`)

    System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 1901); backlink

    Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

  • HDFStore

    • correctly handle nan elements in string columns; serialize via the nan_rep keyword to append

    • raise correctly on non-implemented column types (unicode/date)

    • handle correctly Term passed types (e.g. index<1000, when index is Int64), (closes :issue:`512`)

      System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 1907); backlink

      Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

    • handle Timestamp correctly in data_columns (closes :issue:`2637`)

      System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 1909); backlink

      Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

    • contains correctly matches on non-natural names

    • correctly store float32 dtypes in tables (if not other float types in the same table)

  • Fix DataFrame.info bug with UTF8-encoded columns. (:issue:`2576`)

    System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 1914); backlink

    Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

  • Fix DatetimeIndex handling of FixedOffset tz (:issue:`2604`)

    System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 1915); backlink

    Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

    System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 1938); backlink

    Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

  • Fix partial date parsing issue occuring only when code is run at EOM (:issue:`2618`)

    System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 1940); backlink

    Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

  • Prevent MemoryError when using counting sort in sortlevel with high-cardinality MultiIndex objects (:issue:`2684`)

    System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 1942); backlink

  • Fix bug in Index.summary() where string format methods were being called incorrectly. (:issue:`3869`)

pandas 0.10.0

Release date: 2012-12-17

New Features

  • Brand new high-performance delimited file parsing engine written in C and Cython. 50% or better performance in many standard use cases with a fraction as much memory usage. (:issue:`407`, :issue:`821`)

    System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 1958); backlink

    Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

    System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 1958); backlink

    Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

  • Many new file parser (read_csv, read_table) features:

    • Support for on-the-fly gzip or bz2 decompression (compression option)

    • Ability to get back numpy.recarray instead of DataFrame (as_recarray=True)

    • dtype option: explicit column dtypes

    • usecols option: specify list of columns to be read from a file. Good for reading very wide files with many irrelevant columns (:issue:`1216` :issue:`926`, :issue:`2465`)

      System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 1967); backlink

      Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

      System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 1967); backlink

      Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

      System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 1967); backlink

      Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

    • Enhanced unicode decoding support via encoding option

    • skipinitialspace dialect option

    • Can specify strings to be recognized as True (true_values) or False (false_values)

    • High-performance delim_whitespace option for whitespace-delimited files; a preferred alternative to the 's+' regular expression delimiter

    • Option to skip "bad" lines (wrong number of fields) that would otherwise have caused an error in the past (error_bad_lines and warn_bad_lines options)

    • Substantially improved performance in the parsing of integers with thousands markers and lines with comments

    • Easy of European (and other) decimal formats (decimal option) (:issue:`584`, :issue:`2466`)

      System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 1980); backlink

      Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

      System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 1980); backlink

      Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

    • Custom line terminators (e.g. lineterminator='~') (:issue:`2457`)

      System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 1981); backlink

      Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

    • Handling of no trailing commas in CSV files (:issue:`2333`)

      System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 1982); backlink

      Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

    • Ability to handle fractional seconds in date_converters (:issue:`2209`)

      System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 1983); backlink

      Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

    • read_csv allow scalar arg to na_values (:issue:`1944`)

      System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 1984); backlink

      Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

    • Explicit column dtype specification in read_* functions (:issue:`1858`)

      System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 1985); backlink

      Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

    • Easier CSV dialect specification (:issue:`1743`)

      System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 1986); backlink

      Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

    • Improve parser performance when handling special characters (:issue:`1204`)

      System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 1987); backlink

      Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

  • Google Analytics API integration with easy oauth2 workflow (:issue:`2283`)

    Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

  • Add ffill and bfill convenience functions for forward- and backfilling time series data (:issue:`2284`)

    System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 1998); backlink

    Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

  • New option configuration system and functions set_option, get_option, describe_option, and reset_option. Deprecate set_printoptions and reset_printoptions (:issue:`2393`). You can also access options as attributes via pandas.options.X

    System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 2000); backlink

    Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

  • Wide DataFrames can be viewed more easily in the console with new expand_frame_repr and line_width configuration options. This is on by default now (:issue:`2436`)

    System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 2004); backlink

    Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

  • Scikits.timeseries-like moving window functions via rolling_window (:issue:`1270`)

    System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 2007); backlink

    Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

Experimental Features

  • Add support for Panel4D, a named 4 Dimensional stucture
  • Add support for ndpanel factory functions, to create custom, domain-specific N-Dimensional containers

API Changes

  • The default binning/labeling behavior for resample has been changed to closed='left', label='left' for daily and lower frequencies. This had been a large source of confusion for users. See "what's new" page for more on this. (:issue:`2410`)

    System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 2019); backlink

    Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

  • Methods with inplace option now return None instead of the calling (modified) object (:issue:`1893`)

    System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 2023); backlink

    Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

  • The special case DataFrame - TimeSeries doing column-by-column broadcasting has been deprecated. Users should explicitly do e.g. df.sub(ts, axis=0) instead. This is a legacy hack and can lead to subtle bugs.

  • inf/-inf are no longer considered as NA by isnull/notnull. To be clear, this is legacy cruft from early pandas. This behavior can be globally re-enabled using the new option mode.use_inf_as_null (:issue:`2050`, :issue:`1919`)

    System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 2028); backlink

    Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

    System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 2028); backlink

    Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

  • pandas.merge will now default to sort=False. For many use cases sorting the join keys is not necessary, and doing it by default is wasteful

  • Specify header=0 explicitly to replace existing column names in file in read_* functions.

  • Default column names for header-less parsed files (yielded by read_csv, etc.) are now the integers 0, 1, .... A new argument prefix has been added; to get the v0.9.x behavior specify prefix='X' (:issue:`2034`). This API change was made to make the default column names more consistent with the DataFrame constructor's default column names when none are specified.

    System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 2035); backlink

    Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

  • DataFrame selection using a boolean frame now preserves input shape

  • If function passed to Series.apply yields a Series, result will be a DataFrame (:issue:`2316`)

    System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 2041); backlink

    Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

  • Values like YES/NO/yes/no will not be considered as boolean by default any longer in the file parsers. This can be customized using the new true_values and false_values options (:issue:`2360`)

    System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 2043); backlink

    Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

  • obj.fillna() is no longer valid; make method='pad' no longer the default option, to be more explicit about what kind of filling to perform. Add ffill/bfill convenience functions per above (:issue:`2284`)

    System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 2046); backlink

    Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

  • HDFStore.keys() now returns an absolute path-name for each key

  • to_string() now always returns a unicode string. (:issue:`2224`)

    System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 2050); backlink

    Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

  • File parsers will not handle NA sentinel values arising from passed converter functions

Improvements to existing features

  • Add nrows option to DataFrame.from_records for iterators (:issue:`1794`)

    System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 2057); backlink

    Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

  • Unstack/reshape algorithm rewrite to avoid high memory use in cases where the number of observed key-tuples is much smaller than the total possible number that could occur (:issue:`2278`). Also improves performance in most cases.

pandas 0.9.1

Release date: 2012-11-14

New Features

  • Can specify multiple sort orders in DataFrame/Series.sort/sort_index (:issue:`928`)

    System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 2179); backlink

    Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

  • New top and bottom options for handling NAs in rank (:issue:`1508`, :issue:`2159`)

    System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 2180); backlink

    Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

    System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 2180); backlink

    Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

  • Add where and mask functions to DataFrame (:issue:`2109`, :issue:`2151`)

    System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 2181); backlink

    Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

    System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 2181); backlink

    Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

  • Add at_time and between_time functions to DataFrame (:issue:`2149`)

    System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 2182); backlink

    Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

  • Add flexible pow and rpow methods to DataFrame (:issue:`2190`)

    System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 2183); backlink

    Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

API Changes

  • Upsampling period index "spans" intervals. Example: annual periods upsampled to monthly will span all months in each year

  • Period.end_time will yield timestamp at last nanosecond in the interval (:issue:`2124`, :issue:`2125`, :issue:`1764`)

    System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 2190); backlink

    Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

    System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 2190); backlink

    Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

    System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 2190); backlink

    Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

  • File parsers no longer coerce to float or bool for columns that have custom converters specified (:issue:`2184`)

    System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 2192); backlink

    Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

Improvements to existing features

  • Time rule inference for week-of-month (e.g. WOM-2FRI) rules (:issue:`2140`)

    System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 2198); backlink

    Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

  • Improve performance of datetime + business day offset with large number of offset periods

  • Improve HTML display of DataFrame objects with hierarchical columns

  • Enable referencing of Excel columns by their column names (:issue:`1936`)

    System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 2202); backlink

    Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

  • DataFrame.dot can accept ndarrays (:issue:`2042`)

    System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 2203); backlink

    Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

  • Support negative periods in Panel.shift (:issue:`2164`)

    System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 2204); backlink

    Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

Release date: 10/7/2012

API Changes

  • Change default header names in read_* functions to more Pythonic X0, X1, etc. instead of X.1, X.2. (:issue:`2000`)

    System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 2311); backlink

    Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

  • Deprecated day_of_year API removed from PeriodIndex, use dayofyear (:issue:`1723`)

    System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 2313); backlink

    Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

  • Don't modify NumPy suppress printoption at import time

  • The internal HDF5 data arrangement for DataFrames has been transposed. Legacy files will still be readable by HDFStore (:issue:`1834`, :issue:`1824`)

    System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 2316); backlink

    Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

    System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 2316); backlink

    Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

  • Legacy cruft removed: pandas.stats.misc.quantileTS

  • Use ISO8601 format for Period repr: monthly, daily, and on down (:issue:`1776`)

    System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 2319); backlink

    Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

  • Empty DataFrame columns are now created as object dtype. This will prevent a class of TypeErrors that was occurring in code where the dtype of a column would depend on the presence of data or not (e.g. a SQL query having results) (:issue:`1783`)

    System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 2320); backlink

    Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

  • Setting parts of DataFrame/Panel using ix now aligns input Series/DataFrame (:issue:`1630`)

    System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 2324); backlink

    Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

  • first and last methods in GroupBy no longer drop non-numeric columns (:issue:`1809`)

    System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 2326); backlink

    Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

  • Resolved inconsistencies in specifying custom NA values in text parser. na_values of type dict no longer override default NAs unless keep_default_na is set to false explicitly (:issue:`1657`)

    System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 2328); backlink

    Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

  • Enable skipfooter parameter in text parsers as an alias for skip_footer

pandas 0.8.0

Release date: 6/29/2012

New Features

  • New unified DatetimeIndex class for nanosecond-level timestamp data

  • New Timestamp datetime.datetime subclass with easy time zone conversions, and support for nanoseconds

  • New PeriodIndex class for timespans, calendar logic, and Period scalar object

  • High performance resampling of timestamp and period data. New resample method of all pandas data structures

  • New frequency names plus shortcut string aliases like '15h', '1h30min'

  • Time series string indexing shorthand (:issue:`222`)

    System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 2602); backlink

    Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

    Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

  • Add experimental lreshape function for reshaping wide to long

Improvements to existing features

  • Switch to klib/khash-based hash tables in Index classes for better performance in many cases and lower memory footprint

  • Shipping some functions from scipy.stats to reduce dependency, e.g. Series.describe and DataFrame.describe (:issue:`1092`)

    System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 2662); backlink

    Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

  • Can create MultiIndex by passing list of lists or list of arrays to Series, DataFrame constructor, etc. (:issue:`831`)

API Changes

  • Rename pandas._tseries to pandas.lib

  • Rename Factor to Categorical and add improvements. Numerous Categorical bug fixes

  • Frequency name overhaul, WEEKDAY/EOM and rules with @ deprecated. get_legacy_offset_name backwards compatibility function added

  • Raise ValueError in DataFrame.__nonzero__, so "if df" no longer works (:issue:`1073`)

    System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 2713); backlink

    Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

  • Change BDay (business day) to not normalize dates by default (:issue:`506`)

    System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 2715); backlink

    Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

  • Remove deprecated DataMatrix name

  • Default merge suffixes for overlap now have underscores instead of periods to facilitate tab completion, etc. (:issue:`1239`)

    System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 2717); backlink

    Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

  • Deprecation of offset, time_rule timeRule parameters throughout codebase

  • Series.append and DataFrame.append no longer check for duplicate indexes by default, add verify_integrity parameter (:issue:`1394`)

    System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 2720); backlink

    Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

  • Refactor Factor class, old constructor moved to Factor.from_array

  • Modified internals of MultiIndex to use less memory (no longer represented as array of tuples) internally, speed up construction time and many methods which construct intermediate hierarchical indexes (:issue:`1467`)

    System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 2723); backlink

    Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

pandas 0.7.3

Release date: April 12, 2012

New Features

  • Support for non-unique indexes: indexing and selection, many-to-one and many-to-many joins (:issue:`1306`)

    System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 2791); backlink

    Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

  • Added fixed-width file reader, read_fwf (:issue:`952`)

    System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 2793); backlink

    Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

  • Add group_keys argument to groupby to not add group names to MultiIndex in result of apply (:issue:`938`)

    System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 2794); backlink

    Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

  • DataFrame can now accept non-integer label slicing (:issue:`946`). Previously only DataFrame.ix was able to do so.

    System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 2796); backlink

    Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

  • DataFrame.apply now retains name attributes on Series objects (:issue:`983`)

    System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 2798); backlink

    Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

  • Numeric DataFrame comparisons with non-numeric values now raises proper TypeError (:issue:`943`). Previously raise "PandasError: DataFrame constructor not properly called!"

    System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 2799); backlink

    Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

  • Add kurt methods to Series and DataFrame (:issue:`964`)

    System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 2802); backlink

    Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

    System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 2805); backlink

pandas 0.7.2

Release date: March 16, 2012

New Features

  • Series.sum returns 0 instead of NA when called on an empty series. Analogously for a DataFrame whose rows or columns are length 0 (:issue:`844`)

    Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

pandas 0.7.0

Release date: 2/9/2012

New Features

  • New merge function for efficiently performing full gamut of database / relational-algebra operations. Refactored existing join methods to use the new infrastructure, resulting in substantial performance gains (:issue:`220`, :issue:`249`, :issue:`267`)

    System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 2975); backlink

    Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

    System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 2975); backlink

    Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

    System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 2975); backlink

    Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

  • New concat function for concatenating DataFrame or Panel objects along an axis. Can form union or intersection of the other axes. Improves performance of DataFrame.append (:issue:`468`, :issue:`479`, :issue:`273`)

    System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 2979); backlink

    Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

    System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 2979); backlink

  • Added algorithms module to start collecting central algos

API Changes

  • Label-indexing with integer indexes now raises KeyError if a label is not found instead of falling back on location-based indexing (:issue:`700`)

    System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 3043); backlink

    Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

  • Label-based slicing via ix or [] on Series will now only work if exact matches for the labels are found or if the index is monotonic (for range selections)

  • Label-based slicing and sequences of labels can be passed to [] on a Series for both getting and setting (:issue:`86`)

    System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 3048); backlink

    Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

  • [] operator (__getitem__ and __setitem__) will raise KeyError with integer indexes when an index is not contained in the index. The prior behavior would fall back on position-based indexing if a key was not found in the index which would lead to subtle bugs. This is now consistent with the behavior of .ix on DataFrame and friends (:issue:`328`)

    System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 3050); backlink

    Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

  • Rename DataFrame.delevel to DataFrame.reset_index and add deprecation warning

  • Series.sort (an in-place operation) called on a Series which is a view on a larger array (e.g. a column in a DataFrame) will generate an Exception to prevent accidentally modifying the data source (:issue:`316`)

    System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 3057); backlink

    Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

  • Refactor to remove deprecated LongPanel class (:issue:`552`)

    System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 3060); backlink

    Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

  • Deprecated Panel.to_long, renamed to to_frame

  • Deprecated colSpace argument in DataFrame.to_string, renamed to col_space

  • Rename precision to accuracy in engineering float formatter (GH :issue:`395`)

    System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 3064); backlink

    Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

  • The default delimiter for read_csv is comma rather than letting csv.Sniffer infer it

  • Rename col_or_columns argument in DataFrame.drop_duplicates (GH :issue:`734`)

    System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 3068); backlink

    Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

pandas 0.6.1

Release date: 12/13/2011

API Changes

  • Rename names argument in DataFrame.from_records to columns. Add deprecation warning

  • Boolean get/set operations on Series with boolean Series will reindex instead of requiring that the indexes be exactly equal (:issue:`429`)

    System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 3296); backlink

    Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

New Features

  • Can pass Series to DataFrame.append with ignore_index=True for appending a single row (:issue:`430`)

    System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 3302); backlink

    Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

  • Add Spearman and Kendall correlation options to Series.corr and DataFrame.corr (:issue:`428`)

    System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 3304); backlink

    Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

  • Add new get_value and set_value methods to Series, DataFrame, and Panel to very low-overhead access to scalar elements. df.get_value(row, column) is about 3x faster than df[column][row] by handling fewer cases (:issue:`437`, :issue:`438`). Add similar methods to sparse data structures for compatibility

    System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 3306); backlink

    Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

    System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 3306); backlink

    Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

  • Add Qt table widget to sandbox (:issue:`435`)

    System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 3310); backlink

    Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

  • DataFrame.align can accept Series arguments, add axis keyword (:issue:`461`)

    System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 3311); backlink

    Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

  • Implement new SparseList and SparseArray data structures. SparseSeries now derives from SparseArray (:issue:`463`)

    System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 3312); backlink

    Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

  • max_columns / max_rows options in set_printoptions (:issue:`453`)

    System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 3314); backlink

    Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

  • Implement Series.rank and DataFrame.rank, fast versions of scipy.stats.rankdata (:issue:`428`)

    System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 3315); backlink

    Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

  • Implement DataFrame.from_items alternate constructor (:issue:`444`)

    System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 3317); backlink

    Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

  • DataFrame.convert_objects method for inferring better dtypes for object columns (:issue:`302`)

    System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 3318); backlink

    Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

  • Add rolling_corr_pairwise function for computing Panel of correlation matrices (:issue:`189`)

    System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 3320); backlink

    Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

  • Add margins option to pivot_table for computing subgroup aggregates (GH :issue:`114`)

    System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 3322); backlink

    Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

  • Add Series.from_csv function (:issue:`482`)

    System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 3324); backlink

    Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

    Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

  • Fix performance regression in cross-sectional count in DataFrame, affecting DataFrame.dropna speed

    System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 3347); backlink

    Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

  • MultiIndex.get_level_values can take the level name

    System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 3371); backlink

    System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 3372); backlink

    Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

  • Use Cython map_infer function in DataFrame.applymap to properly infer output type, handle tuple return values and other things that were breaking (:issue:`465`)

    System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 3373); backlink

    Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

  • Handle floating point index values in HDFStore (:issue:`454`)

    System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 3376); backlink

    System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 3377); backlink

pandas 0.6.0

Release date: 11/25/2011

API Changes

  • Arithmetic methods like sum will attempt to sum dtype=object values by default instead of excluding them (:issue:`382`)

    System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 3416); backlink

    Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

New Features

  • Add melt function to pandas.core.reshape

  • Add level parameter to group by level in Series and DataFrame descriptive statistics (:issue:`313`)

    System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 3423); backlink

    Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

  • Add head and tail methods to Series, analogous to to DataFrame (PR :issue:`296`)

    System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 3425); backlink

    Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

  • Add Series.isin function which checks if each value is contained in a passed sequence (:issue:`289`)

    System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 3427); backlink

    Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

  • Add float_format option to Series.to_string

    System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 3430); backlink

    Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

    Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

  • Index name was not being pickled (:issue:`408`)

    System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 3554); backlink

    Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

  • Level name should be passed to result index in GroupBy.apply (:issue:`416`)

    System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 3555); backlink

    Unknown interpreted text role "issue".

Thanks

  • Craig Austin
  • Marius Cobzarenco
  • Joel Cross
  • Jeff Hammerbacher
  • Adam Klein
  • Thomas Kluyver
  • Jev Kuznetsov
  • Kieran O'Mahony
  • Wouter Overmeire
